title: Utilization is limited by the flow rate and link capacity
text:
Link utilization is defined as:
$$\text{Utilization} = \frac{\text{actual throughput on the link}}{\text{link capacity}}$$

For the client links:

Each flow’s throughput = $$\min(R_S, R/4, R_C) = 50\ \text{Mbps}$$

Each client link only carries one flow, so the actual throughput on the link = $$50\ \text{Mbps}$$

Client link capacity = $$R_C = 90\ \text{Mbps}$$
